title: Did Senator Dianne Feinstein Say ‘All Vets Are Mentally Ill’?
subtitle: The claim that Senator Feinstein said 'All vets are mentally ill and the government should prevent them from owning firearms' was an absurd paraphrase.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Senator Dianne Feinstein said that "All vets are mentally ill and the government should prevent them from owning firearms."
